message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, we're confident it will be a valuable asset to you. We're offering this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $18000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering the long-term benefits it promises. Let's discuss how we can make this a mutually beneficial transaction.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you attribute to the product, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $15000 or less. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16000 for your product.
